summary: Alters the size, alignment and positioning of the Shield of Ysgramor.
descriptionHtml:
=========================
= TheOutlander\'s Shield of Ysgramor alterations =
=========================

Author: TheOutlander

Version: v1.0

=========================
= Details : TheOutlander =
=========================

The original mesh was oversized, angled oddly and so it clipped with everything. Also because of the angling it wouldn\'t sit straight on shield wall displays either. This mesh replacer is an attempt to deal with those issues.

The shield is one and a half tenths smaller, reangled and repositioned. It will still clip with some things, but not much more than other shields. It is now closer to the size of the Iron Banded Shield.

================
= Installation =
================

1. Copy and paste the meshes folder from the extracted archive into \"Skyrim\\Data\".


==================
= Uninstallation =
==================

Delete the following files:

Data\\Meshes\\armor\\shieldofysgramor\\1stpersonshieldofysgramor.nif
Data\\Meshes\\armorshieldofysgramor\\shieldofysgramor.nif

=========================
= Permissions and Usage =
=========================

1. 1. You may use the assets from this modification in your modifications.
2. Permission is not required. 
3. Credit is required.
4. A link back to the original modification on your file page is required. 
5. You must inform me (TheOutlander) of your usage of the assets so I can do my happy dance. You do not have to wait for a reply before you can use them or release your mod, but you do have to at least send me a PM to say you are using them before you release your mod.


===========
= History =
===========

TheOutlander\'s Shield of Ysgramor alterations v1.0

Intial release.


===========
= Credits =
===========

Thanks to Me, TheOutlander for creating this modification. 
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to the people behind Nifskope.
author: TheOutlander
